/* Communities */ well this is better, but "communities" is a euphemism for settlements which is a much more common term used overwhelmingly throughout the world. Also, "besides Israel" is redundant.
/* Communities */ no, I've corrected several incorrect claims. "International community" is vague, and not every country has commented on this. As well, they're not all settlements. This is exact.
/* Communities */ You've removed an important distinction. All countries accept legality of Jewish "communities." It's settlements in post 1967 territories that are illegal.
